name: Royal Class Poker
description:
Prove your poker talent and win round after round with a little luck!

Play the most popular of all game types "Texas Hold'em" and compete against up to 10 computer-controlled opponents.

The carefully implemented game rules for No Limit Texas Hold'em and the graphically excellent representation of the poker round ensure hours of fun and casino feeling.

Before a game you can specify almost everything individually, from the number of players to the stakes.

Not only "experts" will have fun with this software, with the help of the integrated instructions even "beginners" can learn the game principle in no time and become enthusiastic fans of this card game classic.

Start a game round now and try a "Full House" or even a "Royal Flush"!
